Queen's Blade OVA: OVAs bundled with the Queen's Blade Premium Visual Book and the Queen's Blade Rebellion Premium Visual Book. Both of the episodes will be based on Queen's Blade Rebellion, a sequel to Queen's Blade: Utsukushiki Toushitachi.
["Queen's Blade: Utsukushiki Toushi-tachi", "Queen's Blade: Rebellion", "Queen's Blade OVA Specials"]
